data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Lampang, Thailand. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lampang, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 812,345 lost people in  Lampang, Thailand have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Lampang, Thailand to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 5,322 believers find a person of peace today among the 817,778 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Thai, Northern people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Thai, Northern people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Thai, Northern people is yours.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Lampang, Thailand.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Lampang that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Lampang to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
